item.title: Exploring Rome in Assassinâ€™s Creed: Brotherhood: Where History Meets Gameplay
item.description: As a kid, I was captivated by stories of kings and conquests, enchanted by tales of brave heroes who traversed vast empires, battled fierce enemies, and transformed the world around them.
